runs.comm: around the wicket, leg stump and flicked to square leg
leg stump again, aims leg side and misses, struck on the pad but it pitched outside leg for the appeal
goes to sweep from outside off and misses, cannons the pad of the keeper
full outside off and driven sweetly past extra-cover, wonderful dive from de Villiers but he can't save four
steps across the stumps and nails a sweep backward of square leg, awesome timing
low full toss just outside off, could have gone to the rope but cover just did enough and it's only a single
short and Hales struck on the body going to pull, they scramble a leg bye to square leg
good length on middle stump, blocked to mid-on
slower ball on leg stump, looking to turn it to leg, struck on the body, again a sharp extra
back of length, cut straight to point! But Morkel has overstepped! It's a no-ball but the replay looks like he was well behind the line! Drama here
free hit, short outside off and cut past extra-cover
lovely drive, touched overpitched and Hales opens the face to steer it wide of cover, super shot, timing was excellent but the placement made that shot
good length on the stumps, looks to play to leg and gets a thick outside edge along the ground through point
back of a length, firm punch to cover
touch short outside off and bang, Lumb pulls it over wide long-on for a flat six! Powered away
now full outside off, swing and a miss, a little swing too
bumper, it was well bowled, right on line, Lumb ducked
played from outside off and gets a thick edge through square leg
full outside off and driven off an outside edge to third man
big leg side wide, whoops
gets the line right here, back of a length, pulled with a short-arm jab to deep midwicket
full on the stumps, gently driven to mid-on where there's a silly fumble and they get a single
full on off stump, flicked out to deep midwicket with excellent timing but straight to the deep fielder

slower ball outside off, comes off an edge back to the bowler who turns and looks to throw down the bowler's end stumps and a direct hit would have seen Hales gone, he dived back and demolished the stumps
Lumb cramped for room and can only block in the crease
full outside off and Lumb drives it over cover for six! Amazing strike, that was huge
down the leg side and falls over to boot
good length at the off stump, firm punch to cover
back of a length just outside off, pushed only to point
fuller and Lumb whacks it down the ground, not the cleanest strike but straight down the ground and enough club to run it to the fence
low full tosd, Lumb drives and manages to pick out extra cover who takes a fine lower catch, excellent grab going to his left and taking it down low, big wicket, Lumb just got the placement wrong
back of a length at off stump, pushed from the crease to mid-off
fuller and turned to mid-on and a scrambled run gets Moeen off the mark
full at the pads, it runs to short long leg for a sharp single
full and wide, this is missed and was inside the guideline apparently
good length, played at and missed
back of a length and pulled away, just short of the deep square leg fence, good connection
fuller outside off and carved for four through point, nicely put away
short and Hales gets across to it and smashes it into the seats behind midwicket, huge strike, awesome timing
tossed up on the stumps, flicked through midwicket for just a single
full on leg stump, Hales this time flicks through midwicket
googly, Moeen tried to reverse paddle and missed
floated up outside off, Moeen flashes a drive at it and squirts it over point for a streaky couple
flatter delivery, Moeen back on his stumps and cuts and gets it wide of point, excellent placement, it races for four
forward now just outside off pushing in front of short third man for a sharp single
back of a length, Moeen back and clipping through midwicket
leg side wide, Hales' pulled missed

full outside off, Hales drives in the air towards cover and he hasn't got enough on this and deep cover takes the catch running in. The ball was there to hit but Hales didn't get the timing right, it squirted off the outer half of the bat and found Miller who took a solid catch, huge wicket

back of a length, Moeen goes to pull and gets a tickle on it that and it carries low to de Kock who claims the chance nicely down low to his right hand side diving forward, excellent catch and the South Africans are cock-a-hoop, two huge wickets in consecutive balls
hat-trick ball squares Buttler up but he gets a thick outside edge to third man
full outside off, Morgan drives without timing into the covers
good length, Morgan plays from the crease and gets a thick inside edge wide of long leg but Hendricks does really well to save two
full length slides down leg
full and driven hard to extra cover
Morgan gives himself room and lifts this up and over extra cover, good timing and enough elevation to clear the fielder
full toss, might have gone long, but Morgan can only chip it down to long-on on a couple of bounces
outside off, Buttler reaches out and slaps it down to long-on
reverse sweep from leg stump, backward point comes up to field smartly
full on leg stump, tickled to short long leg and they sprint a single
forward and driven out through cover, easy single
Morgan takes a step down the wicket but gets cramped up and has to just push it to square leg for a single
too wide outside off
tighter line and flicked through square leg
full on leg stump, picked up down to long leg
driven past extra cover but not enough power to beat the sweeper
back of a length on the stumps, tucked into square leg
a step back to leg and then back to the crease, blocks a straight ball
slider with Buttler back on his stumps, he squirts it through square leg and they race back for the second, good running
full toss, tapped slowly into midwicket and they get two more again
length on off stump, pushed wide of extra cover for a single
Morgan back and drops this into cover for a quick run
flighted googly, flicked behind square leg, just a single
length just outside off, open face down to third man
back to cut but the line is a little tight and Morgan almost drags this into his stumps, gets a single to leg
Buttler across his stumps and flicks through midwicket for an easy run
short ball over off stump, Morgan tried to uppercut and missed
forward and gets a thick inside edge wide of long leg for a couple
slower ball outside off, Morgan gets a thick inside edge down to long-on

slider outside off, Morgan back to cut but it's onto him too quickly and this takes a thin outside edge that is safely pouched by de Kock. Excellent delivery and Morgan falls far too cheaply than was required for his side
leg stump full toss flicked through midwicket for an easy single
touch flat and short, flicked through square leg for a quick two is it, no
back of a length, pushed out to deep cover
around the wicket, swept off leg stump and deep-backward square runs around to save the boundary
forward and pushed out through cover
around the wicket, full and Buttler lifts it over a flying de Villiers at mid-off, decent strike
another swing down the ground and this time it evades mid-on, solid thump and just out of the reach of the fielder diving to his right
Buttler standing across his stumps gets cramped up and hit on the pads, just the extra
length ball slides down the leg side
forward and gets a thick inside edge through square leg
slower ball bouncer, Buttler looks to swat it over the leg side but is deceived and misses, nicely bowled
length ball, slapped over long-on, lovely clean strike into the stands, big stride forward and bang it's way back
around the wicket, tapped into the covers, no single available
full delivery that Bopara misses with a sweep, it slips under de Kock's legs and runs out to the boundary, excellent save from Parnell, in fact under edge from Bopara
forward press and just blocked
reverse sweep and he picks out backward point good connection from Buttler but no placement, straight to the fielder and it's easily pouched, huge moment in the game, is that England gone now?
wide and full, dug out into the off side, sharp single before de Kock can get up
back and tapped down to long-on for a quick single
swung to leg and gets a thick edge to deep square leg
leg side wide
back and knocked into the leg side for a single
full just outside off, pushed into the covers for an easy run but England need more than this now
clears the front leg and goes to swing over the leg side, misses completely
lifted down the leg side, bit of a top edge but four nevertheless, a vital boundary
back cut and Hendricks does ever so well to save two, sharp work
back on his stumps and dropped into the covers for a single
big heave to leg, rather head in the air, well short of deep-square leg
step across the stumps, clip to leg and again just a single with deep-square across quickly
big swing outside off and gets a large piece of it wide of third man
Bopara sets himself across his stumps and Steyn goes for a slower ball which deceives the batsman, hit on the body and a single to leg
short ball but wide outside off
short and nailed into the leg side but only finds the fielder, not good enough
excellent yorker, edged through midwicket, singles, even twos are fine for South Africa
just one again, swung into the off side but straight to deep cover
back of a length on the stumps, Jordan with a swing and a miss aiming leg side
low full toss, Jordan can only find deep midwicket, simply not good enough for England
finally a boundary, clean swing down the ground and nails it right back past the bowler
four more, wide full toss and Bopara slaps it to the cover fence
excellent yorker, only dug out back to the bowler
low full toss and Jordan swings it off side and evades extra cover, nice strike

swung down the ground but this is struck properly and de Villiers running back takes an excellent catch. It was a ball to hit, on a length but Jordan didn't get hold of it enough and could only chip it to where de Villiers could field it
short ball, slower ball outside off and Bopara is totally foxed, flapping at it and missing
misses the yorker and Bopara launches it for six over the long-off fence, great shot
slides down leg, that is a bonus for England
length on the stumps and only mistimed down to long-on

length and Bopara lifts it high, high into the night sky, but not long enough, Miller with the catch that's a solid take and England surely now are dead. Again, like Jordan, it was a very hittable ball but Bopara simply mistimed it
full outside off, swung at and gets an edge down to third man
step to leg and swings a length ball on the bounce to long-on
back and Bresnan pulls it into the stands, lovely strike and its sails over the rope
full just outside off, Bresnan swings it hard and gets a thick inside edge past the leg stump to the long leg fence
full just outside off and Bresnan puts a lovely swing on it and puts it over long-off, great finish but all too little too late
